name: Melted (karolissto)
description:
You control a sphere of fire which melts snow. As you flow around you lose health, which can be restored by burning wood (flowing on top of it) or if you have enough health you can lit a campfire which heals over time.  Every action that you make costs health.

This was a project for university, so it'll probably never be completed, but if I'll get a lot of good feedback I may finish it.
